        <tags>
          <tag>(3)</tag>
          <tag role="refnum">3</tag>
        </tags>
        <MathFork>
          <Math tex="\displaystyle\mbox{(IN)}\quad\quad x_{i+1}^{k}:=x_{i}^{k}-\alpha^{k}\big{(}H_{%&#10;i}^{k}\big{)}^{-1}\nabla f_{i}(x_{i}^{k}),\quad i=1,2,\dots,m," text="formulae@(list@([(IN)], (x _ (i + 1)) ^ k) assign (x _ i) ^ k - alpha ^ k * (H _ i) ^ k ^ (- 1) * nabla@(f _ i) * (x _ i) ^ k, i = list@(1, 2, dots, m))" xml:id="S0.E3.m4">
            <XMath>
              <XMDual>
                <XMRef idref="S0.E3.m4.6"/>
                <XMWrap>
                  <XMDual xml:id="S0.E3.m4.6">
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="formulae"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S0.E3.m4.6.1"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S0.E3.m4.6.2"/>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMApp xml:id="S0.E3.m4.6.1">
                        <XMTok meaning="assign" role="RELOP">:=</XMTok>
                        <XMDual>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                            <XMRef idref="S0.E3.m4.1"/>
                            <XMRef idref="S0.E3.m4.6.1.1"/>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMWrap>
                            <XMText xml:id="S0.E3.m4.1">(IN)</XMText>
                            <XMTok name="qquad" role="PUNCT">  </XMTok>
                            <XMApp xml:id="S0.E3.m4.6.1.1">
                              <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post8"/>
                              <XMApp>
                                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post8"/>

                                </XMApp>
                              </XMApp>

                            </XMApp>
                          </XMWrap>
                        </XMDual>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok meaning="minus" role="ADDOP">-</XMTok>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post8"/>
                            <XMApp>
                              <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post8"/>
                              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                              <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">i</XMTok>

                          </XMApp>

                            <XMApp>

                            </XMApp>
                            <XMApp>
                              <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post8"/>
                              <XMDual>
                                <XMRef idref="S0.E3.m4.6.1.2"/>

      <Math mode="display" tex="\hat{f}_{j}(x,x_{j}^{k})=f_{j}(x_{j}^{k})+\nabla f_{j}(x_{j}^{k})^{T}(x-x_{j}^%&#10;{k})+\frac{1}{2}(x-x_{j}^{k})^{T}\nabla^{2}f_{j}(x_{j}^{k})(x-x_{j}^{k})." text="(hat@(f)) _ j * open-interval@(x, (x _ j) ^ k) = f _ j * (x _ j) ^ k + nabla@(f _ j) * (x _ j) ^ k ^ T * (x - (x _ j) ^ k) + (1 / 2) * (x - (x _ j) ^ k) ^ T * (nabla ^ 2)@(f _ j) * (x _ j) ^ k * (x - (x _ j) ^ k)" xml:id="S0.E8.m1">

  <para xml:id="p10">
    <equation xml:id="S0.Ex5">
      <Math mode="display" tex="x_{i+1}^{k}=x_{i}^{k}-\big{(}H_{i}^{k}\big{)}^{-1}\big{(}\alpha^{k}\nabla f_{i%&#10;}(x_{i}^{k})\big{)},\quad i=1,2,\dots,m," text="formulae@((x _ (i + 1)) ^ k = (x _ i) ^ k - (H _ i) ^ k ^ (- 1) * alpha ^ k * nabla@(f _ i) * (x _ i) ^ k, i = list@(1, 2, dots, m))" xml:id="S0.Ex5.m1">
        <XMath>
          <XMDual>
            <XMRef idref="S0.Ex5.m1.5"/>
            <XMWrap>
              <XMDual xml:id="S0.Ex5.m1.5">
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="formulae"/>
                  <XMRef idref="S0.Ex5.m1.5.1"/>
                  <XMRef idref="S0.Ex5.m1.5.2"/>
                </XMApp>
                <XMWrap>
                  <XMApp xml:id="S0.Ex5.m1.5.1">
                    <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="plus" role="ADDOP">+</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">i</XMTok>
                          <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">k</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="minus" role="ADDOP">-</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                          <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">i</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">k</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                          <XMDual>
                            <XMRef idref="S0.Ex5.m1.5.1.1"/>

    <equation xml:id="S0.Ex7">
      <Math mode="display" tex="z_{i}^{k}=-\big{(}C_{i}^{k}\big{)}^{-T}\big{(}\alpha^{k}\nabla f_{i}(x_{i}^{k}%&#10;)-\nabla^{2}f_{i}(x_{i}^{k})x_{i}^{k}\big{)}." text="(z _ i) ^ k = - (C _ i) ^ k ^ (- T) * (alpha ^ k * nabla@(f _ i) * (x _ i) ^ k - (nabla ^ 2)@(f _ i) * (x _ i) ^ k * (x _ i) ^ k)" xml:id="S0.Ex7.m1">

      <equation xml:id="S0.Ex10">
        <MathFork>
          <Math tex="\displaystyle x_{i+1}^{k}=x_{1}^{k}+\big{(}H_{i}^{k}\big{)}^{-1}\sum_{j=1}^{i}%&#10;(C_{j}^{k})^{T}(z_{j}^{k}-C_{j}^{k}x_{1}^{k})=x_{1}^{k}-\big{(}H_{i}^{k}\big{)%&#10;}^{-1}\bigg{(}\sum_{j=1}^{i}\alpha^{k}\nabla f_{j}(x_{j}^{k})+\nabla^{2}f_{j}(%&#10;x_{j}^{k})(x_{1}^{k}-x_{j}^{k})\bigg{)}" text="(x _ (i + 1)) ^ k = (x _ 1) ^ k + (H _ i) ^ k ^ (- 1) * ((sum _ (j = 1)) ^ i)@((C _ j) ^ k ^ T * ((z _ j) ^ k - (C _ j) ^ k * (x _ 1) ^ k)) = (x _ 1) ^ k - (H _ i) ^ k ^ (- 1) * (((sum _ (j = 1)) ^ i)@(alpha ^ k * nabla@(f _ j) * (x _ j) ^ k) + (nabla ^ 2)@(f _ j) * (x _ j) ^ k * ((x _ 1) ^ k - (x _ j) ^ k))" xml:id="S0.Ex10.m4">

      <tags>
        <tag>(14)</tag>
        <tag role="refnum">14</tag>
      </tags>
      <Math mode="display" tex="cI\preceq\nabla^{2}f_{i}(x)\preceq CI," text="c * I precedes-or-equals (nabla ^ 2)@(f _ i) * x precedes-or-equals C * I" xml:id="S0.E14.m1">

          <XMDual>

                    <XMApp>

                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>

  <para xml:id="p20">
    <equation labels="LABEL:eq:gradient-Lipschitzness" xml:id="S0.E15">
      <tags>
        <tag>(15)</tag>
        <tag role="refnum">15</tag>
      </tags>
      <Math mode="display" tex="\|f_{i}(x)-f_{i}(y)\|\leq{C}\|x-y\|,\quad i=1,2,\dots,m," text="formulae@(norm@(f _ i * x - f _ i * y) less= C * norm@(x - y), i = list@(1, 2, dots, m))" xml:id="S0.E15.m1">
        <XMath>
          <XMDual>
            <XMRef idref="S0.E15.m1.7"/>
            <XMWrap>
              <XMDual xml:id="S0.E15.m1.7">
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="formulae"/>

                </XMApp>
                <XMWrap>
                  <XMApp xml:id="S0.E15.m1.7.1">
                    <XMTok meaning="less-than-or-equals" name="leq" role="RELOP">≤</XMTok>
                    <XMDual>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="norm"/>
                        <XMRef idref="S0.E15.m1.7.1.1"/>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMTok meaning="parallel-to" name="||" role="VERTBAR">∥</XMTok>
                        <XMApp xml:id="S0.E15.m1.7.1.1">
                          <XMTok meaning="minus" role="ADDOP">-</XMTok>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                            <XMApp>
                              <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">f</XMTok>
                              <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">i</XMTok>
                            </XMApp>
                            <XMDual>
                              <XMRef idref="S0.E15.m1.1"/>
                              <XMWrap>
                                <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S0.E15.m1.1">x</XMTok>
                                <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                              </XMWrap>
                            </XMDual>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                            <XMApp>
                              <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">f</XMTok>
                              <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">i</XMTok>
                            </XMApp>
                            <XMDual>
                              <XMRef idref="S0.E15.m1.2"/>
                              <XMWrap>
                                <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S0.E15.m1.2">y</XMTok>
                                <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                              </XMWrap>
                            </XMDual>
                          </XMApp>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="parallel-to" name="||" role="VERTBAR">∥</XMTok>
                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>

                      <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>

                        <XMApp>

      </tags>
      <Math mode="display" tex="\frac{ckm}{2}I\preceq H_{i}^{k},\quad D_{i}^{k}\preceq\frac{2}{ckm}I." text="formulae@(((c * k * m) / 2) * I precedes-or-equals (H _ i) ^ k, (D _ i) ^ k precedes-or-equals (2 / (c * k * m)) * I)" xml:id="S0.E20.m1">

  <para xml:id="p26">
    <equation xml:id="S0.Ex11">
      <Math mode="display" tex="1\leq\alpha^{k}\leq\max(1,\alpha_{*}^{k}),\quad k=1,2,\dots," text="formulae@(1 less= alpha ^ k less= maximum@(1, (alpha _ *) ^ k), k = list@(1, 2, dots))" xml:id="S0.Ex11.m1">
        <XMath>
          <XMDual>
            <XMRef idref="S0.Ex11.m1.6"/>
            <XMWrap>

      <Math mode="display" tex="\alpha_{*}^{k}=\begin{cases}\frac{1-\eta}{C}\frac{(x_{1}^{k+1}-x_{1}^{k})^{T}H%&#10;_{m}^{k}(x_{1}^{k+1}-x_{1}^{k})}{\|x_{1}^{k+1}-x_{1}^{k}\|\sum_{i=2}^{m}\|x_{i%&#10;}^{k}-x_{1}^{k}\|+\frac{m}{2}\|x_{1}^{k+1}-x_{1}^{k}\|^{2}},\hfill&amp;\text{ if ,%&#10; }\\&#10;0,\hfill&amp;\text{ otherwise},\end{cases}" text="(alpha _ *) ^ k = cases@(((1 - eta) / C) * ((((x _ 1) ^ (k + 1) - (x _ 1) ^ k) ^ T * (H _ m) ^ k * ((x _ 1) ^ (k + 1) - (x _ 1) ^ k)) / (norm@((x _ 1) ^ (k + 1) - (x _ 1) ^ k) * ((sum _ (i = 2)) ^ m)@(norm@((x _ i) ^ k - (x _ 1) ^ k)) + (m / 2) * (norm@((x _ 1) ^ (k + 1) - (x _ 1) ^ k)) ^ 2)), [ if , ], 0, [ otherwise])" xml:id="S0.E21.m1">

    <equationgroup class="ltx_eqn_eqnarray" xml:id="S0.EGx8">
      <equation xml:id="S0.Ex12">
        <MathFork>
          <Math tex="\displaystyle\|x_{1}^{k+1}-x_{1}^{k}\|=\alpha^{k}\|D_{m}^{k}h_{m}^{k}\|=O(%&#10;\alpha^{k}/k)." text="norm@((x _ 1) ^ (k + 1) - (x _ 1) ^ k) = alpha ^ k * norm@((D _ m) ^ k * (h _ m) ^ k) = O * (alpha ^ k / k)" xml:id="S0.Ex12.m2">
            <XMath>
              <XMDual>
                <XMRef idref="S0.Ex12.m2.1"/>
                <XMWrap>
                  <XMApp xml:id="S0.Ex12.m2.1">
                    <XMTok meaning="multirelation"/>
                    <XMDual>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="norm"/>
                        <XMRef idref="S0.Ex12.m2.1.1"/>

                        <XMTok meaning="parallel-to" name="||" role="VERTBAR">∥</XMTok>

                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>
                    <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>

                      </XMApp>

                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok meaning="norm"/>
                          <XMRef idref="S0.Ex12.m2.1.2"/>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMWrap>
                          <XMTok meaning="parallel-to" name="||" role="VERTBAR">∥</XMTok>
                          <XMApp xml:id="S0.Ex12.m2.1.2">
                            <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                            <XMApp>
                              <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post8"/>
                              <XMApp>
                                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post8"/>

                            </XMApp>

                        </XMWrap>
                      </XMDual>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">O</XMTok>
                      <XMDual>
                        <XMRef idref="S0.Ex12.m2.1.3"/>
                        <XMWrap>
                          <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                          <XMApp xml:id="S0.Ex12.m2.1.3">

  <para xml:id="p33">
    <equationgroup class="ltx_eqn_eqnarray" xml:id="S0.EGx9">
      <equation xml:id="S0.Ex16">
        <MathFork>
          <Math tex="\displaystyle\alpha_{*}^{k}=\frac{1-\eta}{C}\frac{(h_{m}^{k})^{T}D_{m}^{k}h_{m%&#10;}^{k}}{\|D_{m}^{k}h_{m}^{k}\|\sum_{i=2}^{m}\|D_{i-1}^{k}h_{i-1}^{k}\|+\frac{m}%&#10;{2}\|D_{m}^{k}h_{m}^{k}\|^{2}}\leq\frac{1-\eta}{C}\frac{\frac{1}{cmk}\|h_{m}^{%&#10;k}\|^{2}}{(1/Cmk)^{2}(\|h_{m}^{k}\|\sum_{i=2}^{m}\|h_{i-1}^{k}\|+\frac{m}{2}\|%&#10;h_{m}^{k}\|^{2})}=\phi\frac{1}{(2/m)\sum_{i=2}^{m}\|h_{i-1}^{k}\|/\|h_{m}^{k}%&#10;\|+1}k\leq\phi k" text="(alpha _ *) ^ k = ((1 - eta) / C) * (((h _ m) ^ k ^ T * (D _ m) ^ k * (h _ m) ^ k) / (norm@((D _ m) ^ k * (h _ m) ^ k) * ((sum _ (i = 2)) ^ m)@(norm@((D _ (i - 1)) ^ k * (h _ (i - 1)) ^ k)) + (m / 2) * (norm@((D _ m) ^ k * (h _ m) ^ k)) ^ 2)) less= ((1 - eta) / C) * (((1 / (c * m * k)) * (norm@((h _ m) ^ k)) ^ 2) / (((1 / C) * m * k) ^ 2 * (norm@((h _ m) ^ k) * ((sum _ (i = 2)) ^ m)@(norm@((h _ (i - 1)) ^ k)) + (m / 2) * (norm@((h _ m) ^ k)) ^ 2))) = phi * (1 / ((2 / m) * ((sum _ (i = 2)) ^ m)@(norm@((h _ (i - 1)) ^ k) / norm@((h _ m) ^ k)) + 1)) * k less= phi * k" xml:id="S0.Ex16.m4">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="multirelation"/>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post8"/>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post8"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" name="alpha" role="UNKNOWN">α</XMTok>
                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="times" role="MULOP">*</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">k</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok mathstyle="display" meaning="divide" role="FRACOP"/>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="minus" role="ADDOP">-</XMTok>
                      <XMTok meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" name="eta" role="UNKNOWN">η</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">C</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMApp>

          <MathBranch>
            <tr>
              <td align="right"><Math mode="inline" tex="\displaystyle\alpha_{*}^{k}" text="(alpha _ *) ^ k" xml:id="S0.Ex13.m1">
                  <XMath>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post8"/>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post8"/>
                        <XMTok font="italic" name="alpha" role="UNKNOWN">α</XMTok>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="times" role="MULOP">*</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">k</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMath>
                </Math></td>
              <td align="center"><Math mode="inline" tex="\displaystyle=" text="=" xml:id="S0.Ex13.m2">
                  <XMath>
                    <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                  </XMath>
                </Math></td>
              <td align="left"><Math mode="inline" tex="\displaystyle\frac{1-\eta}{C}\frac{(h_{m}^{k})^{T}D_{m}^{k}h_{m}^{k}}{\|D_{m}^%&#10;{k}h_{m}^{k}\|\sum_{i=2}^{m}\|D_{i-1}^{k}h_{i-1}^{k}\|+\frac{m}{2}\|D_{m}^{k}h%&#10;_{m}^{k}\|^{2}}" text="((1 - eta) / C) * (((h _ m) ^ k ^ T * (D _ m) ^ k * (h _ m) ^ k) / (norm@((D _ m) ^ k * (h _ m) ^ k) * ((sum _ (i = 2)) ^ m)@(norm@((D _ (i - 1)) ^ k * (h _ (i - 1)) ^ k)) + (m / 2) * (norm@((D _ m) ^ k * (h _ m) ^ k)) ^ 2))" xml:id="S0.Ex13.m3">
                  <XMath>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok mathstyle="display" meaning="divide" role="FRACOP"/>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok meaning="minus" role="ADDOP">-</XMTok>
                          <XMTok meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" name="eta" role="UNKNOWN">η</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>

              <td align="left"><Math mode="inline" tex="\displaystyle\phi k" text="phi * k" xml:id="S0.Ex16.m3">
                  <XMath>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>

                          </XMApp>

                        <XMText xml:id="S0.E28.m1.4">and</XMText>

  <para xml:id="p39">
    <equationgroup class="ltx_eqn_eqnarray" xml:id="S0.EGx10">
      <equation labels="LABEL:ineq-inner-dist-bd-by-grad-helper" xml:id="S0.E29">
        <tags>
          <tag>(29)</tag>
          <tag role="refnum">29</tag>
        </tags>
        <MathFork>
          <Math tex="\displaystyle\|x_{j+1}^{k}-x_{1}^{k}\|\leq B_{j}^{k}\gamma^{k}\|\nabla f(x_{1}%&#10;^{k})\|+\|x_{j+1}^{k}-x_{j}^{k}\|\leq B_{j}^{k}\gamma^{k}\|\nabla f(x_{1}^{k})%&#10;\|+\frac{2\gamma^{k}}{cm}\big{\|}\nabla f_{j}(x_{j}^{k})\big{\|}\leq B_{j}^{k}%&#10;\gamma^{k}\|\nabla f(x_{1}^{k})\|+\frac{2\gamma^{k}}{cm}\bigg{(}M\big{\|}%&#10;\nabla f(x_{1}^{k})\big{\|}+{C}\big{\|}x_{j}^{k}-x_{1}^{k}\big{\|}\bigg{)}\leq&#10;B%&#10;_{j}^{k}\gamma^{k}\|\nabla f(x_{1}^{k})\|+\frac{2\gamma^{k}}{cm}\bigg{(}M\big{%&#10;\|}\nabla f(x_{1}^{k})\big{\|}+{C}B_{j}^{k}\gamma^{k}\|\nabla f(x_{1}^{k})\|%&#10;\bigg{)}=\bigg{(}B_{j}^{k}\big{(}1+\frac{2Q}{m}\gamma^{k}\big{)}+\frac{2M}{cm}%&#10;\bigg{)}\gamma^{k}\|\nabla f(x_{1}^{k})\|," text="norm@((x _ (j + 1)) ^ k - (x _ 1) ^ k) less= (B _ j) ^ k * gamma ^ k * norm@(nabla@(f) * (x _ 1) ^ k) + norm@((x _ (j + 1)) ^ k - (x _ j) ^ k) less= (B _ j) ^ k * gamma ^ k * norm@(nabla@(f) * (x _ 1) ^ k) + ((2 * gamma ^ k) / (c * m)) * norm@(nabla@(f _ j) * (x _ j) ^ k) less= (B _ j) ^ k * gamma ^ k * norm@(nabla@(f) * (x _ 1) ^ k) + ((2 * gamma ^ k) / (c * m)) * (M * norm@(nabla@(f) * (x _ 1) ^ k) + C * norm@((x _ j) ^ k - (x _ 1) ^ k)) less= (B _ j) ^ k * gamma ^ k * norm@(nabla@(f) * (x _ 1) ^ k) + ((2 * gamma ^ k) / (c * m)) * (M * norm@(nabla@(f) * (x _ 1) ^ k) + C * (B _ j) ^ k * gamma ^ k * norm@(nabla@(f) * (x _ 1) ^ k)) = ((B _ j) ^ k * (1 + ((2 * Q) / m) * gamma ^ k) + (2 * M) / (c * m)) * gamma ^ k * norm@(nabla@(f) * (x _ 1) ^ k)" xml:id="S0.E29.m4">

                  <XMath>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="plus" role="ADDOP">+</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post8"/>
                          <XMApp>

                  <XMath>
                    <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                  </XMath>
                </Math></td>
              <td align="left"><Math mode="inline" tex="\displaystyle\bigg{(}B_{j}^{k}\big{(}1+\frac{2Q}{m}\gamma^{k}\big{)}+\frac{2M}%&#10;{cm}\bigg{)}\gamma^{k}\|\nabla f(x_{1}^{k})\|," text="((B _ j) ^ k * (1 + ((2 * Q) / m) * gamma ^ k) + (2 * M) / (c * m)) * gamma ^ k * norm@(nabla@(f) * (x _ 1) ^ k)" xml:id="S0.E29.m3">
                  <XMath>
                    <XMDual>
                      <XMRef idref="S0.E29.m3.1"/>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMApp xml:id="S0.E29.m3.1">
                          <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                          <XMDual>

    <equationgroup class="ltx_eqn_eqnarray" xml:id="S0.EGx11">
      <equation labels="LABEL:ineq-grad-approx-error" xml:id="S0.E33">
        <tags>
          <tag>(33)</tag>
          <tag role="refnum">33</tag>
        </tags>
        <MathFork>
          <Math tex="\displaystyle\|\nabla f(x_{1}^{k})-h_{m}^{k}\|\leq\sum_{j=1}^{m}\bigg{(}\|%&#10;\nabla f_{j}(x_{j}^{k})-\nabla f_{j}(x_{1}^{k})\|+\frac{1}{\alpha^{k}}\|\nabla%&#10;^{2}f_{j}(x_{j}^{k})(x_{1}^{k}-x_{j}^{k})\|\bigg{)}\leq C(1+1/\alpha^{k})\sum_%&#10;{j=2}^{m}\|x_{j}^{k}-x_{1}^{k}\|,\par\par" text="norm@(nabla@(f) * (x _ 1) ^ k - (h _ m) ^ k) less= ((sum _ (j = 1)) ^ m)@(norm@(nabla@(f _ j) * (x _ j) ^ k - nabla@(f _ j) * (x _ 1) ^ k) + (1 / alpha ^ k) * norm@((nabla ^ 2)@(f _ j) * (x _ j) ^ k * ((x _ 1) ^ k - (x _ j) ^ k))) less= C * (1 + 1 / alpha ^ k) * ((sum _ (j = 2)) ^ m)@(norm@((x _ j) ^ k - (x _ 1) ^ k))" xml:id="S0.E33.m4">

  <para xml:id="p49">
    <equation labels="LABEL:ineq-Ik-bound" xml:id="S0.E37">
      <tags>
        <tag>(37)</tag>
        <tag role="refnum">37</tag>
      </tags>
      <Math mode="display" tex="\limsup_{k\to\infty}\frac{I_{k}}{\gamma^{k}}\leq\frac{B(\phi)}{1-B(\phi)C{{%&#10;\overline{\gamma}}}}\leq\frac{B(\phi)}{1-B(\phi)C\phi}," text="(limit-supremum _ (k to infinity))@(I _ k / gamma ^ k) less= (B * phi) / (1 - B * phi * C * overline@(gamma)) less= (B * phi) / (1 - B * phi * C * phi)" xml:id="S0.E37.m1">
        <XMath>
          <XMDual>
            <XMRef idref="S0.E37.m1.5"/>
            <XMWrap>
              <XMApp xml:id="S0.E37.m1.5">
                <XMTok meaning="multirelation"/>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMApp scriptpos="mid">
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="mid2"/>
                    <XMTok meaning="limit-supremum" name="limsup" role="LIMITOP" scriptpos="mid">lim sup</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" name="to" role="ARROW">→</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">k</XMTok>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="infinity" name="infty" role="ID">∞</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok mathstyle="display" meaning="divide" role="FRACOP"/>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">I</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">k</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" name="gamma" role="UNKNOWN">γ</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">k</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="less-than-or-equals" name="leq" role="RELOP">≤</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok mathstyle="display" meaning="divide" role="FRACOP"/>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">B</XMTok>
                    <XMDual>
                      <XMRef idref="S0.E37.m1.1"/>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" name="phi" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S0.E37.m1.1">ϕ</XMTok>
                        <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="minus" role="ADDOP">-</XMTok>
                    <XMTok meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">B</XMTok>
                      <XMDual>
                        <XMRef idref="S0.E37.m1.2"/>
                        <XMWrap>
                          <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" name="phi" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S0.E37.m1.2">ϕ</XMTok>
                          <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                        </XMWrap>
                      </XMDual>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">C</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok name="overline" role="OVERACCENT">¯</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" name="gamma" role="UNKNOWN">γ</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="less-than-or-equals" name="leq" role="RELOP">≤</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok mathstyle="display" meaning="divide" role="FRACOP"/>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">B</XMTok>
                    <XMDual>
                      <XMRef idref="S0.E37.m1.3"/>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" name="phi" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S0.E37.m1.3">ϕ</XMTok>
                        <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="minus" role="ADDOP">-</XMTok>
                    <XMTok meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">B</XMTok>
                      <XMDual>
                        <XMRef idref="S0.E37.m1.4"/>
                        <XMWrap>
                          <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" name="phi" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S0.E37.m1.4">ϕ</XMTok>
                          <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                        </XMWrap>
                      </XMDual>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">C</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" name="phi" role="UNKNOWN">ϕ</XMTok>

      <Math mode="display" tex="B_{max}:=\sup_{\phi\in(0,2Q)}B(\phi)=\lim_{\phi\to 2Q}B(\phi)&lt;\infty" text="B _ (m * a * x) assign (supremum _ (phi element-of open-interval@(0, 2 * Q)))@(B * phi) = (limit _ (phi to 2 * Q))@(B * phi) less infinity" xml:id="S0.Ex32.m1">

    <equationgroup class="ltx_eqn_eqnarray" xml:id="S0.EGx16">
      <equation xml:id="S0.Ex34">
        <MathFork>
          <Math tex="\displaystyle\|e^{k}\|\leq\sum_{j=1}^{m}\bigg{(}\|\nabla f_{j}(x_{j}^{k})-%&#10;\nabla f_{j}(x_{1}^{k})\|+\frac{1}{\alpha^{k}}\|\nabla^{2}f_{j}(x_{j}^{k})\|\|%&#10;x_{1}^{k}-x_{j}^{k}\|\bigg{)}\leq(C+{C}/\alpha^{k})\gamma^{k}\sum_{j=1}^{m}B_{%&#10;j}^{k}(\phi)\|\nabla f(x_{1}^{k})\|={C(\gamma^{k}+1/k)}B^{k}(\phi)\|\nabla f(x%&#10;_{1}^{k})\|," text="norm@(e ^ k) less= ((sum _ (j = 1)) ^ m)@(norm@(nabla@(f _ j) * (x _ j) ^ k - nabla@(f _ j) * (x _ 1) ^ k) + (1 / alpha ^ k) * norm@((nabla ^ 2)@(f _ j) * (x _ j) ^ k) * norm@((x _ 1) ^ k - (x _ j) ^ k)) less= (C + C / alpha ^ k) * gamma ^ k * ((sum _ (j = 1)) ^ m)@((B _ j) ^ k * phi * norm@(nabla@(f) * (x _ 1) ^ k)) = C * (gamma ^ k + 1 / k) * B ^ k * phi * norm@(nabla@(f) * (x _ 1) ^ k)" xml:id="S0.Ex34.m4">

              <td align="left"><Math mode="inline" tex="\displaystyle(C+{C}/\alpha^{k})\gamma^{k}\sum_{j=1}^{m}B_{j}^{k}(\phi)\|\nabla&#10;f%&#10;(x_{1}^{k})\|={C(\gamma^{k}+1/k)}B^{k}(\phi)\|\nabla f(x_{1}^{k})\|," text="(C + C / alpha ^ k) * gamma ^ k * ((sum _ (j = 1)) ^ m)@((B _ j) ^ k * phi * norm@(nabla@(f) * (x _ 1) ^ k)) = C * (gamma ^ k + 1 / k) * B ^ k * phi * norm@(nabla@(f) * (x _ 1) ^ k)" xml:id="S0.Ex34.m3">

                    <XMDual>

  <para xml:id="p67">
    <equation xml:id="S0.Ex38">
      <Math mode="display" tex="\bar{\delta}_{k}=\Delta_{k}\bigg{(}F^{\prime}(y^{k})+\Delta_{k}\bigg{)}^{-1}F(%&#10;y^{k})+\bigg{(}I-\Delta_{k}(F^{\prime}(y^{k})+\Delta_{k})^{-1}\bigg{)}\delta_{k}" text="(bar@(delta)) _ k = Delta _ k * (F ^ prime * y ^ k + Delta _ k) ^ (- 1) * F * y ^ k + (I - Delta _ k * (F ^ prime * y ^ k + Delta _ k) ^ (- 1)) * delta _ k" xml:id="S0.Ex38.m1">
        <XMath>
          <XMApp>
            <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
            <XMApp>
              <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok name="bar" role="OVERACCENT" stretchy="false">¯</XMTok>

            </XMApp>
            <XMApp>
              <XMTok meaning="plus" role="ADDOP">+</XMTok>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>

                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                  <XMTok name="Delta" role="UNKNOWN">Δ</XMTok>

                </XMApp>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMRef idref="S0.Ex38.m1.1"/>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok fontsize="210%" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>

                        <XMTok meaning="plus" role="ADDOP">+</XMTok>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                          <XMApp>

                                  <XMText xml:id="S0.E48.m1.4.1"> otherwise</XMText>
                                  <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                                </XMWrap>
                              </XMDual>
                            </XMCell>
                          </XMRow>
                        </XMArray>
                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMath>
              </Math></td>
          </MathBranch>
        </MathFork>
      </equation>
    </equationgroup>
  </para>

    <equationgroup class="ltx_eqn_eqnarray" xml:id="S0.EGx20">
      <equation labels="LABEL:ineq-limsup-error-hessian LABEL:ineq-limsup" xml:id="S0.E53">

          <tag>(53)</tag>
          <tag role="refnum">53</tag>
        </tags>
        <MathFork>
          <Math tex="\displaystyle\limsup_{k\to\infty}\bigg{\|}\Delta_{k}\bigg{(}F^{\prime}(y^{k})+%&#10;\Delta_{k}\bigg{)}^{-1}\bigg{\|}=\limsup_{k\to\infty}\bigg{\|}I-\gamma^{k}%&#10;\nabla^{2}f(y^{k})\bar{H}_{k}^{-1}\bigg{\|}\leq 1-\frac{\liminf_{k\to\infty}%&#10;\gamma^{k}}{Q}=1-\frac{\nu\kappa}{Q}" text="(limit-supremum _ (k to infinity))@(norm@(Delta _ k * (F ^ prime * y ^ k + Delta _ k) ^ (- 1))) = (limit-supremum _ (k to infinity))@(norm@(I - gamma ^ k * (nabla ^ 2)@(f) * y ^ k * ((bar@(H)) _ k) ^ (- 1))) less= 1 - (limit-infimum _ (k to infinity))@(gamma ^ k) / Q = 1 - (nu * kappa) / Q" xml:id="S0.E53.m4">

                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>

  <para xml:id="p79">
    <equation labels="LABEL:ineq-neces-cond-for-lin-conv" xml:id="S0.E58">
      <tags>
        <tag>(58)</tag>
        <tag role="refnum">58</tag>
      </tags>
      <Math mode="display" tex="0&lt;\phi&lt;\overline{\phi}_{\nu}\leq\min\bigg{(}\frac{1}{Q},\frac{1}{B(\phi)C}%&#10;\bigg{)}." text="0 less phi less (overline@(phi)) _ nu less= minimum@(1 / Q, 1 / (B * phi * C))" xml:id="S0.E58.m1">
        <XMath>
          <XMDual>
            <XMRef idref="S0.E58.m1.5"/>
            <XMWrap>
              <XMApp xml:id="S0.E58.m1.5">
                <XMTok meaning="multirelation"/>
                <XMTok meaning="0" role="NUMBER">0</XMTok>
                <XMTok meaning="less-than" role="RELOP">&lt;</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" name="phi" role="UNKNOWN">ϕ</XMTok>
                <XMTok meaning="less-than" role="RELOP">&lt;</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok name="overline" role="OVERACCENT">¯</XMTok>

    <equation labels="LABEL:def-delta-jk" xml:id="S0.E66">
      <tags>
        <tag>(66)</tag>
        <tag role="refnum">66</tag>
      </tags>
      <Math mode="display" tex="\delta_{j}^{k}:=\|\nabla f_{j}(x_{j}^{k})-\nabla f_{j}(x_{1}^{k})\|,\quad j=1,%&#10;2,\dots,m." text="formulae@((delta _ j) ^ k assign norm@(nabla@(f _ j) * (x _ j) ^ k - nabla@(f _ j) * (x _ 1) ^ k), j = list@(1, 2, dots, m))" xml:id="S0.E66.m1">
        <XMath>
          <XMDual>
            <XMRef idref="S0.E66.m1.5"/>
            <XMWrap>
              <XMDual xml:id="S0.E66.m1.5">
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="formulae"/>
                  <XMRef idref="S0.E66.m1.5.1"/>
                  <XMRef idref="S0.E66.m1.5.2"/>
                </XMApp>
                <XMWrap>
                  <XMApp xml:id="S0.E66.m1.5.1">
                    <XMTok meaning="assign" role="RELOP">:=</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                        <XMTok font="italic" name="delta" role="UNKNOWN">δ</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">j</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">k</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMDual>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="norm"/>
                        <XMRef idref="S0.E66.m1.5.1.1"/>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMTok meaning="parallel-to" name="||" role="VERTBAR">∥</XMTok>
                        <XMApp xml:id="S0.E66.m1.5.1.1">
                          <XMTok meaning="minus" role="ADDOP">-</XMTok>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                            <XMApp>
                              <XMTok name="nabla" role="OPERATOR">∇</XMTok>
                              <XMApp>
                                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">f</XMTok>
                                <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">j</XMTok>
                              </XMApp>
                            </XMApp>
                            <XMDual>
                              <XMRef idref="S0.E66.m1.5.1.1.1"/>
                              <XMWrap>
                                <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                                <XMApp xml:id="S0.E66.m1.5.1.1.1">
                                  <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                                  <XMApp>
                                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>

                                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">k</XMTok>

                              </XMWrap>
                            </XMDual>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                            <XMApp>
                              <XMTok name="nabla" role="OPERATOR">∇</XMTok>
                              <XMApp>
                                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>

                            <XMDual>
                              <XMRef idref="S0.E66.m1.5.1.1.2"/>
                              <XMWrap>
                                <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                                <XMApp xml:id="S0.E66.m1.5.1.1.2">
                                  <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                                  <XMApp>
                                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>

                        </XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="parallel-to" name="||" role="VERTBAR">∥</XMTok>
                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>

  <para xml:id="p94">
    <equationgroup class="ltx_eqn_eqnarray" xml:id="S0.EGx28">
      <equation labels="LABEL:ineq-distance-bound-inner-iters-start" xml:id="S0.Ex59">
        <MathFork>
          <Math tex="\displaystyle\delta_{\ell+1}^{k}\leq{C}\|x_{\ell+1}^{k}-x_{1}^{k}\|\leq{C}\sum%&#10;_{i=1}^{l}\|x_{i+1}^{k}-x_{i}^{k}\|={C}\sum_{j=1}^{l}\alpha^{k}\|D_{j}^{k}%&#10;\nabla f_{j}(x_{j}^{k})\|\leq r^{k}\sum_{j=1}^{\ell}\|\nabla f_{j}(x_{j}^{k})%&#10;\|\leq r^{k}\sum_{j=1}^{\ell}\bigg{(}\|\nabla f_{j}(x_{1}^{k})\|+r^{k}\sum_{i=%&#10;1}^{j-1}(1+r^{k})^{j-1-i}\|\nabla f_{i}(x_{1}^{k})\|\bigg{)}" text="(delta _ (ell + 1)) ^ k less= C * norm@((x _ (ell + 1)) ^ k - (x _ 1) ^ k) less= C * ((sum _ (i = 1)) ^ l)@(norm@((x _ (i + 1)) ^ k - (x _ i) ^ k)) = C * ((sum _ (j = 1)) ^ l)@(alpha ^ k * norm@((D _ j) ^ k * nabla@(f _ j) * (x _ j) ^ k)) less= r ^ k * ((sum _ (j = 1)) ^ ell)@(norm@(nabla@(f _ j) * (x _ j) ^ k)) less= r ^ k * ((sum _ (j = 1)) ^ ell)@(norm@(nabla@(f _ j) * (x _ 1) ^ k) + r ^ k * ((sum _ (i = 1)) ^ (j - 1))@((1 + r ^ k) ^ (j - 1 - i) * norm@(nabla@(f _ i) * (x _ 1) ^ k)))" xml:id="S0.Ex59.m4">

  <para xml:id="p96">
    <equation labels="LABEL:eq-grad-error-delta-jk-bound" xml:id="S0.E73">
      <tags>
        <tag>(73)</tag>
        <tag role="refnum">73</tag>
      </tags>
      <Math mode="display" tex="\|e^{k}\|\leq\sum_{j=2}^{m}\bigg{(}\delta_{j}^{k}+\frac{1}{k\gamma^{k}}{C}\|x_%&#10;{j}^{k}-x_{1}^{k}\|\bigg{)}\\&#10;" text="norm@(e ^ k) less= ((sum _ (j = 2)) ^ m)@((delta _ j) ^ k + (1 / (k * gamma ^ k)) * C * norm@((x _ j) ^ k - (x _ 1) ^ k))" xml:id="S0.E73.m1">
        <XMath>
          <XMApp>
            <XMTok meaning="less-than-or-equals" name="leq" role="RELOP">≤</XMTok>
            <XMDual>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="norm"/>
                <XMRef idref="S0.E73.m1.1"/>
              </XMApp>
              <XMWrap>
                <XMTok meaning="parallel-to" name="||" role="VERTBAR">∥</XMTok>
                <XMApp xml:id="S0.E73.m1.1">
                  <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">e</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">k</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="parallel-to" name="||" role="VERTBAR">∥</XMTok>
              </XMWrap>
            </XMDual>
            <XMApp>
              <XMApp scriptpos="mid">
                <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="mid2"/>
                <XMApp scriptpos="mid">
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="mid2"/>
                  <XMTok mathstyle="display" meaning="sum" role="SUMOP" scriptpos="mid">∑</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">j</XMTok>
                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
                <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">m</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
              <XMDual>
                <XMRef idref="S0.E73.m1.2"/>
                <XMWrap>
                  <XMTok fontsize="210%" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                  <XMApp xml:id="S0.E73.m1.2">
                    <XMTok meaning="plus" role="ADDOP">+</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>

      <Math mode="display" tex="\delta_{l+1}^{k}\leq{C}\|x_{\ell+1}^{k}-x_{1}^{k}\|\leq r^{k}\sum_{j=1}^{\ell}%&#10;(1+r^{k})^{\ell-j}\|\nabla f_{j}(x_{1}^{k})\|" text="(delta _ (l + 1)) ^ k less= C * norm@((x _ (ell + 1)) ^ k - (x _ 1) ^ k) less= r ^ k * ((sum _ (j = 1)) ^ ell)@((1 + r ^ k) ^ (ell - j) * norm@(nabla@(f _ j) * (x _ 1) ^ k))" xml:id="S0.E74.m1">

    <equation labels="LABEL:ineq-lin-conv-constants" xml:id="S0.E76">
      <tags>
        <tag>(76)</tag>

    <equation labels="LABEL:bounds-aver-hessian-inv" xml:id="S0.E77">
      <tags>
        <tag>(77)</tag>
        <tag role="refnum">77</tag>
      </tags>
      <Math mode="display" tex="\frac{1}{Cm}I\preceq\bar{D}^{k}\preceq\frac{1}{cm}I" text="(1 / (C * m)) * I precedes-or-equals (bar@(D)) ^ k precedes-or-equals (1 / (c * m)) * I" xml:id="S0.E77.m1">
        <XMath>
          <XMApp>
            <XMTok meaning="multirelation"/>
            <XMApp>
              <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>

                <XMTok mathstyle="display" meaning="divide" role="FRACOP"/>
                <XMTok meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>

                </XMApp>

            </XMApp>

                <XMTok mathstyle="display" meaning="divide" role="FRACOP"/>

          <Math tex="\displaystyle\langle\nabla V(x_{1}^{k}),s^{k}\rangle=\langle\nabla f(x_{1}^{k}%&#10;),\bar{D}_{k}\nabla f(x_{1}^{k})+\bar{D}_{k}e^{k}\rangle\geq\frac{1}{Cm}\|%&#10;\nabla f(x_{1}^{k})\|^{2}-\frac{1}{cm}{{\bar{\xi}}}\|\nabla f(x_{1}^{k})\|^{2}%&#10;=\frac{1}{Cm}(1-{{\bar{\xi}}}Q)\|\nabla f(x_{1}^{k})\|^{2}\geq\frac{2}{Q}(1-{{%&#10;\bar{\xi}}}Q)V(x_{1}^{k})\geq 0," text="list@(nabla@(V) * (x _ 1) ^ k, s ^ k) = list@(nabla@(f) * (x _ 1) ^ k, (bar@(D)) _ k * nabla@(f) * (x _ 1) ^ k + (bar@(D)) _ k * e ^ k) &gt;= (1 / (C * m)) * (norm@(nabla@(f) * (x _ 1) ^ k)) ^ 2 - (1 / (c * m)) * bar@(xi) * (norm@(nabla@(f) * (x _ 1) ^ k)) ^ 2 = (1 / (C * m)) * (1 - bar@(xi) * Q) * (norm@(nabla@(f) * (x _ 1) ^ k)) ^ 2 &gt;= (2 / Q) * (1 - bar@(xi) * Q) * V * (x _ 1) ^ k &gt;= 0" xml:id="S0.Ex65.m4">

              <td align="left"><Math mode="inline" tex="\displaystyle\frac{1}{3}\frac{1}{Q}(1+r^{k})^{m-2}\|\nabla f(x_{1}^{k})\|\leq%&#10;\frac{2}{3}\frac{1}{Q}\|\nabla f(x_{1}^{k})\|," text="(1 / 3) * (1 / Q) * (1 + r ^ k) ^ (m - 2) * norm@(nabla@(f) * (x _ 1) ^ k) less= (2 / 3) * (1 / Q) * norm@(nabla@(f) * (x _ 1) ^ k)" xml:id="S0.E79.m3">

                    <XMDual>

                            <XMApp>

                              <XMDual>
                                <XMRef idref="S0.E79.m3.1.1"/>
                                <XMWrap>

    <equationgroup class="ltx_eqn_eqnarray" xml:id="S0.EGx37">
      <equation labels="LABEL:example-incr-newt-iter-quadratic" xml:id="S0.E84">
        <tags>
          <tag>(84)</tag>
          <tag role="refnum">84</tag>
        </tags>
        <MathFork>
          <Math tex="\displaystyle x_{1}^{k+1}\par=\bigg{(}1-\frac{\alpha^{k}}{2k}\bigg{)}\bigg{(}1%&#10;-\frac{\alpha^{k}}{2k-1}\bigg{)}x_{1}^{k}+\frac{1000}{2\varepsilon}\frac{%&#10;\alpha^{k}}{2k}\frac{\alpha^{k}-1}{2k-1}." text="(x _ 1) ^ (k + 1) = (1 - alpha ^ k / (2 * k)) * (1 - alpha ^ k / (2 * k - 1)) * (x _ 1) ^ k + (1000 / (2 * varepsilon)) * (alpha ^ k / (2 * k)) * ((alpha ^ k - 1) / (2 * k - 1))" xml:id="S0.E84.m4">
            <XMath>
              <XMDual>
                <XMRef idref="S0.E84.m4.1"/>
                <XMWrap>
                  <XMApp xml:id="S0.E84.m4.1">
                    <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post8"/>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post8"/>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="plus" role="ADDOP">+</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">k</XMTok>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="plus" role="ADDOP">+</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                        <XMDual>
                          <XMRef idref="S0.E84.m4.1.1"/>
                          <XMWrap>
                            <XMTok fontsize="210%" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                            <XMApp xml:id="S0.E84.m4.1.1">
                              <XMTok meaning="minus" role="ADDOP">-</XMTok>
                              <XMTok meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                              <XMApp>
                                <XMTok mathstyle="display" meaning="divide" role="FRACOP"/>
                                <XMApp>

                                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">k</XMTok>
                                </XMApp>
                                <XMApp>
                                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>

                                </XMApp>
                              </XMApp>
                            </XMApp>

                          <XMWrap>
                            <XMTok fontsize="210%" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                            <XMApp xml:id="S0.E84.m4.1.2">
                              <XMTok meaning="minus" role="ADDOP">-</XMTok>
                              <XMTok meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                              <XMApp>
                                <XMTok mathstyle="display" meaning="divide" role="FRACOP"/>
                                <XMApp>
                                  <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post9"/>
                                  <XMTok font="italic" name="alpha" role="UNKNOWN">α</XMTok>

                                </XMApp>
